arts.ttl: Chelsea enquire over Sporting Lisbon teenager Dario Essugo - as Blues look to bring in midfield reinforcements on deadline day
arts.sum: Essugo, 19, has spent the season on loan with Spanish outfit Las Palmas and has impressed with his displays in the heart of midfield throughout 2024-25.

arts.ttl: Chelsea transfer news: Sporting Lisbon youngster Dario Essugo emerges as deadline day option?
arts.sum: Chelsea are reportedly giving consideration to pushing through a deal for a Sporting Lisbon prospect before the close of business on Monday.

arts.ttl: Former Ajax and Bayer Leverkusen defender Daley Sinkgraven joins Fortuna Sittard
arts.sum: Eredivisie outfit Fortuna Sittard have announced the permanent signing of Daley Sinkgraven. The former Ajax full-back has signed a one-and-a-half-year deal with the club following the termination of his contract…

arts.ttl: Official: Girona announce signing of Juventus star
arts.sum: La Liga outfit Girona have on Saturday announced a fresh addition to the club’s midfield ranks. The player to have put pen to paper on terms at the Estadi Montilivi?…

arts.ttl: Roma yet to reach agreement with Las Palmas for Mika Marmol
arts.sum: Serie A side Roma are still far away from reaching an agreement with Las Palmas for the transfer of Mika Marmol but they will continue the chase. According to a…
